overview: The film is adapted from the hit historical comic series of the same name of Vietnam - Long Than Tuong, created by the comic group Phong Duong Comics. And Le Nhat Lan is a character in that series. With the vision of creating unique works and nurturing young talents, the next product of Ngo Thanh Van and Studio68 has received great support from the audience at the largest comic event in Vietnam.
title: Lê Nhật Lan
